pages.text: $(li)The Charged Arrow is a variant of the common $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrows$(/l) that works as ammunition for $(l:patchouli:weapons/bow)Bows$(/l), $(l:patchouli:weapons/glowsilk_bow)Glowsilk Bows$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:weapons/crossbow)Crossbows$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be fired by $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/dispenser)Dispensers$(/l) too.
$(li)If a fired Charged Arrow hits a block, it will produce a redstone pulse lasting about 1 second.
